roleset.name: recommend against a course of action
roleset.note: CONTRAINDICATE-V NOTES: Based on medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/19/10) (from contraindicate.101-v predicate notes)
CONTRAINDICATION-N NOTES: Corresponds to contraindicate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from contraindication.01-n)
CONTRAINDICATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from contraindicated.101-j)

example.text: Severe penicillin allergy contraindicates use of ampicillin.

example.name: Arg2
example.text: The contraindications for MRIs include metal plates, screws, or devices such as pacemakers.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Pregnancy's contraindications include sushi and skydiving.
